page1.title: Scan the QR Code
page1.desc: You can easy find this application and use it.

page2.title: Collect Points
page2.desc: Use application save the world and collect the point

page3.title: Save The Nature
page3.desc: You are hero of the world please save the world. Let's fight together for our world!!

tutorial.profilePictureDescription: You can see your profile photo here and change it by going to the profile page.
tutorial.barcodeDescription: Scan the QR code and earn your points after passing the control stage.
tutorial.profilePageDescription: You can see the points you have earned on the profile page.
tutorial.heroesPageDescription: View the top list organized each week.
tutorial.settingsDescription: You can manage app settings and account settings from the settings page.
tutorial.themeDescription: You can set the theme mode with a single button without going to the settings section of the light and dark mode.

errorDialog.error1Description:
The QR Code could not be read. 
 Please try again.
errorDialog.error2Description: Your score could not be transferred due to an error in the service. Please try again.
errorDialog.error3Description: The name and garbage container QR Code is not equal !!

scanBarcodeView.mainName:
Let's recycle in 
 a few steps.
scanBarcodeView.step1Description: Scan the QR code of the recycling waste
scanBarcodeView.step2Description: Now scan the QR Code of the recycling bin that matches
scanBarcodeView.step3Description: Now you can put your recycling waste in the box and your points will be loaded on your card

profileView.description:
To find out the equivalent of your score,
 please visit our website
